announcementBar.betaSentence: ðŸš€ Tauri Beta has landed! Click here for more details.

config.tagline: Build smaller, faster, and more secure desktop applications with a web frontend

index.description: Tauri is a framework for building tiny, blazing fast binaries for all major desktop platforms. Developers can integrate any front-end framework that compiles to HTML, JS and CSS for building their user interface.
index.subtitle:
Build smaller, faster, and more secure
desktop applications with a web frontend

items.label: Brownfield
items.description: compatibility with any front-end framework means you don't have to change your stack

items.label: FLOSS
items.description: relicensing is possible with Tauri

items.label: Bundle
items.description: size of a Tauri App can be less than 600KB

items.label: Security
items.description: is the Tauri-Team's biggest priority and drives our innovation

items.label: Patterns
items.description: are here to help you choose important features with simple configuration

items.label: Cross-platform
items.description: compilation allows to bundle binaries for major desktop platforms (mobile & WASM coming soon)

roadmap.title: Roadmap
roadmap.notice: Notice: This roadmap is subject to change.

items.label: CLI
items.description: Generate, develop and build Tauri apps from the command line.

items.label: API
items.description: Finalize, audit, write documentation and create examples for the smoke-tests.

items.label: Testing & CI
items.description: Implement CI with testing and bundle-pipeline validation.

items.label: Desktop Bundler
items.description: Bundle for all major desktops from native systems.

items.label: Alpha Release
items.description: Technical Release Candidate for desktop, edge cases and bugs acceptable.

items.label: Sidecar
items.description: Integrate and instrument other binaries.

items.label: Splashscreen
items.description: Use a splashscreen while the main content is loading.

items.label: App Storage
items.description: Use a canonical location to store userdata.

items.label: Native Notifications
items.description: Cross-platform notifications using polyfilled WEB API.

items.label: GH Action for Building Apps
items.description: Build your Web application as a Tauri binary for MacOS, Linux and Windows

items.label: VS Code Extension
items.description: Commands and validate tauri.conf.json

items.label: Core Plugin System
items.description: Build reusable plugins to extend Tauri core.

items.label: CLI Updater
items.description: Update core dependencies automatically from the CLI.

items.label: Webview Bindings
items.description: New pure Rust Webview bindings.

items.label: Keyboard Shortcuts
items.description: Hook and react to keypresses.

items.label: Multi Window
items.description: Run multiple window instances in Tauri.

items.label: Rust-based CLI
items.description: Create Rust CLI.

items.label: Transparent Window
items.description: Have transparent windows.

items.label: Secure Context for Web APIs
items.description: Setup secure context to enable access to restricted APIs.

items.label: Self Updater
items.description: Update Tauri Apps from within Tauri.

items.label: Window Menus
items.description: Desktop Cross-platform Window Menus.

items.label: App Tray
items.description: Desktop Cross-platform Icon Tray.

items.label: Beta Release
items.description: Generally stable on Desktop, API locked down.

items.label: Channel API
items.description: Send messages through a channel.

items.label: Security Audit
items.description: 3rd party security audit of core libraries.

items.label: WebRTC
items.description: Rust-based webrtc.

items.label: Iframe with native API
items.description: Opt-in feature enabling for iframe dialog with Tauri and the native API.

items.label: Scoped FileSystem
items.description: For improved security of files interaction.

items.label: Clipboard
items.description: Enable programmatic and keyboard access to clipboard.

items.label: One-Time Commands
items.description: Run a command that is no longer available after first run.

items.label: DENO Bindings
items.description: Use Deno to build your App's backend.

items.label: Mobile Bundler
items.description: Bundle to all major mobile device operating systems.

items.label: Cross Compiler
items.description: Generate bundled binaries from select operating system environments.

items.label: PureOS App Store
items.description: Verified builds for PureOS.

items.label: Stable Release
items.description: Stable on On all Platforms.

items.label: Other Bindings
items.description: Go, Nim, Python, C++ and other bindings are possible with the stable API.

items.label: Alternative Renderer
items.description: Candidate presentation for Webview Alternatives, including GL windowing.

items.label: Tauri-Frida
items.description: A decompiler and threat analyzer for Tauri Apps, using Frida.

items.label: The Future
items.description: Something missing? Got a great idea? We want you to help us make it happen.

premium_sponsors.description: A password manager, digital vault, form filler and secure digital wallet. 1Password remembers all your passwords for you to help keep account information safe.
Become a premium sponsor to help the Tauri development.

sponsors.description: This project's infrastructure is supported in part by Digital Ocean. Click the button here to visit the Digital Ocean website and get $100 credit that you can use within 60 days.
Our docs are continuously deployed thanks to the kind support and amazing tooling provided to us by netlify. Their service puts the continuity in CI and the fun in functionality.

Mailscript helps us automate and wrangle our many, many github notifications and apply granular actions to mails using rules. Whether forwards, catchalls, webhooks or even SMS notifications - MailScript() keeps on innovating!

ClickUp is one app to replace them all. It's the future of work - where anyone can work on anything. More than just task management - ClickUp offers docs, reminders, goals, calendars, scheduling, and even an inbox. Fully customizable, ClickUp works for every type of team, so all teams can use the same app to plan, organize, and collaborate.

The awesome folks at wallaby.js comped the core team of Tauri with their futuristic REPL in the IDE test runner. If you avoid testing your JS because it takes so long - with wallaby you'll appreciate the immediate inline feedback. We do...

collaborators.description: GUIJS is a toolkit for making your devlife easier. This collaboration enabled the extension of Tauri to have a new mode, the sidecar.

It can be argued that the humble beginnings of Tauri stretch back to a conversation where PureOS explained that Electron apps will never ship on the official PureOS store, and something else would be needed.
The first adopter of Tauri, close collaborators with common interests. IOTA is a permissionless distributed ledger technology, without miners and suited for low power devices.
A data-driven game engine, in Rust - committed to nuturing an open source community.
If PureOS planted the seed of Tauri, Kayaba from Meros really kicked the can down the road with a perfectly timed question.
One of the most polyglot professionals out there, TensorProgramming shares his knowledge and excitement about dozens of different programming languages on his YouTube channel.

showcase.content: Here are the applications that have been made with Tauri!

projects.description: A free, tiny, simple, beautiful and useful app to do a lucky draw or make a roll call.
Write Arabic text on apps that don't support bidirectional text.
Generate "experiment wise safety sheets" in compliance to European law.
Real-time speech-to-text/keyboard input captions for OBS.
Local client for chucknorris.io built with Tauri and Vue.js 3.
Reversably introduce bugs into your code so that you can safely practice debugging.
A lite and simple two-factor authentication app for desktop.
Local SMTP Server For Email Testing/Debugging.
